body_html:
I guess my only source of confusion is that per_image_whitening makes it sound like whitening is done independently of all other images -- any type of batch statistics no longer makes it 'per image'. I think I would prefer per_batch_whitening for this new function, and leaving per_image_whitening as is?

What do you think @shlens ?

body:
I guess my only source of confusion is that per_image_whitening makes it sound like whitening is done independently of all other images -- any type of batch statistics no longer makes it 'per image'.  I think I would prefer per_batch_whitening for this new function, and leaving per_image_whitening as is? 

What do you think @shlens ?
